landing.bio: I am an engineering student in information systems, currently working as a software developer at Mobile Computing Argentina and CTO at PÃ¼l. My tech stack includes Python and Javascript. Java for server side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend. I use Spring Boot framework for the server side development and Angular for the frontend development. I have also worked with Rest Api.

experience.aboutWork: Building Api with Java and Front End with Angular.

Pul makes commuting faster, more comfortable, and more predictable by connecting people going the same way through a mobile app. Drivers can share their car to reduce their expenses, and riders can enjoy the comfort of taking a car on everyday commutes, without even having to own one.
Building new apps with Ionic for Ios & android.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
